overview: An exciting look at 50 years of Newcastle's own Bruce Goold’s Art and Life. From growing up in his father's GOOLD INTERIORS in Auckland Street to his 1970s Bohemian days in Sydney's infamous YELLOW HOUSE, to grand hotel renovations on Lord Howe Island, to the 40th anniversary commemoration edition for the Sydney Opera House, and precious collections in the Powerhouse Museum and Sydney Lady Mayor’s Town Hall office.
title: Under the Lino: The Art
